scripts.validate: npm run build && npm run lint
scripts.deploy: npm run validate && git add . && git commit -m 'ðŸš€ Automated deployment' && git push origin main
scripts.campaign:enable-first-month: echo 'Enabling first month promo...' && vercel env add NEXT_PUBLIC_ENABLE_FIRST_MONTH_PROMO true production
scripts.campaign:disable-first-month: echo 'Disabling first month promo...' && vercel env rm NEXT_PUBLIC_ENABLE_FIRST_MONTH_PROMO production
scripts.campaign:enable-today-only: echo 'Enabling today only promo...' && vercel env add NEXT_PUBLIC_ENABLE_TODAY_ONLY_PROMO true production
scripts.campaign:status: echo 'Checking campaign status...' && vercel env ls
scripts.pricing:enable-new: vercel env add NEXT_PUBLIC_ENABLE_NEW_PRICING true production && vercel --prod
scripts.pricing:disable-new: vercel env rm NEXT_PUBLIC_ENABLE_NEW_PRICING production && vercel --prod
